kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=foodie, url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/api, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/restaurants path_url=/api/restaurants headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/restaurants status=200, reason=OK headers={'Server': 'Werkzeug/3.1.5 Python/3.11.9', 'Date': 'Wed, 11 Feb 2026 09:21:11 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '3', 'Connection': 'close'} body=[]
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.
